```{r data_load}
# Loading of the data
data <- read.csv("data/US_presidential_elections_10_states.csv")
# First visualization
head(data, 10)
```

```{r}
vote <- rep("R",length(data$State))
for (i in 1:length(data$State)) 
  if(data$Average.of.Republicans.2016[i] < 50)
    vote[i]="D"
data$Vote <- vote
cat(data$Vote)
  
  
data %>%
  ggplot( aes(x=Average.of.Poverty.Rate.below.federal.poverty.threshold,
              y=Average.of.White..Not.Latino..Population, 
              color=Vote,
              size=Average.of.Violent.crime,)) +
    geom_point() + 
    geom_label(label=data$State,  nudge_x = 0.25, 
               nudge_y=3, color="black", size = 2.5) +
    ggtitle("Countries with the population")
```
